name: Miara, Thorn of the Glade
oracle_text:
Whenever Miara, Thorn of the Glade or another Elf you control dies, you may pay {1} and 1 life. If you do, draw a card.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

name: Viscera Seer
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Fleshbag Marauder
oracle_text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

name: Blazing Sunsteel
flavor_text: Wyleth emerged from the crated unscathed with the sun's fury trapped in his hands.

name: Expedite
oracle_text:
Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "I run, and thunder follows."

name: Dualcaster Mage
oracle_text:
Flash
When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."

name: Comet Storm
oracle_text:
Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Choose any target, then choose another target for each time this spell was kicked. Comet Storm deals X damage to each of them.

name: Relentless Assault
oracle_text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

name: Jaya's Immolating Inferno
oracle_text:
(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)
Jaya's Immolating Inferno deals X damage to each of up to three targets.
flavor_text: Centuries ago, a pyromancer's spark ignited a fiery conflagration.

name: Fists of Flame
oracle_text: Draw a card. Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +1/+0 for each card you've drawn this turn.
flavor_text:
"Fire has always been my most faithful companion."
—Jared Carthalion

name: Word of Seizing
oracle_text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Untap target permanent and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Obey!"

name: Wild Ricochet
oracle_text: You may choose new targets for target instant or sorcery spell. Then copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text:
"May your day never match your expectations."
—Scriptus Fleen, flectomancer

name: Volcanic Fallout
oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text:
"How can we outrun the sky?"
—Hadran, sunseeder of Naya

name: Court of Ire
oracle_text:
When Court of Ire enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Court of Ire deals 2 damage to any target. If you're the monarch, it deals 7 damage to that player or permanent instead.

name: Stumpsquall Hydra
oracle_text: When Stumpsquall Hydra enters the battlefield, distribute X +1/+1 counters among it and any number of commanders.
flavor_text: In preparation to grow new heads, a hydra may rid itself of older ones.

name: Beast Within
oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor_text: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." ―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

name: Avenger of Zendikar
oracle_text:
When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each land you control.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

name: Khalni Heart Expedition
oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition.
Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Harmonize
oracle_text: Draw three cards.
flavor_text: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

name: Explore
oracle_text:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

name: Eternal Witness
oracle_text: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

name: Cultivate
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

name: Rampaging Baloths
oracle_text:
Trample
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
flavor_text:
"When the land is angry, so are they."
—Nissa Revane

name: Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer
oracle_text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
flavor_text: "My mind is the spread of the canopy. My heart is the embrace of the roots. I am deathless Llanowar, its fury and its peace."

name: Sporemound
oracle_text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text:
"If you threaten its territory, it produces spores. Actually, no matter what you do, it produces spores."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Search for Tomorrow
oracle_text:
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Retreat to Kazandu
oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• You gain 2 life.

name: Ramunap Excavator
oracle_text: You may play lands from your graveyard.
flavor_text: "This world was once so much more than the confines of Naktamun."

name: Verdant Sun's Avatar
oracle_text: Whenever Verdant Sun's Avatar or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor_text:
"Ixalli's fertile rays enliven us all. Each of us is a testament to the sun's strength and love."
—Chitlati, Lightning Rider

name: Terastodon
oracle_text: When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

name: Yavimaya Elder
oracle_text:
When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
{2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

name: Wickerbough Elder
oracle_text:
Wickerbough Elder enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
{G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Wickerbough Elder: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "Living scarecrows make a mockery of the natural order. Dead ones make fine hats."

name: Wyleth, Soul of Steel
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Wyleth, Soul of Steel attacks, draw a card for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.
flavor_text: "Two things a warrior needs: a strong sword and a strong will."

name: Aesi, Tyrant of Gyre Strait
oracle_text:
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"To sail through those waters is to offer oneself as tribute."
—Caption Hoyrik

name: Growth Spiral
oracle_text: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: Cyclical and spiral patterns are the specialty of the Gyre Clade, which seeks to revitalize the cycles of nature.

name: Fathom Mage
oracle_text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

name: Deflecting Palm
oracle_text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. If damage is prevented this way, Deflecting Palm deals that much damage to that source's controller.

name: Simic Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Sharktocrab, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
